title: Final Black Sabbath Concert Kicks off with Mastodon, Rival Sons, Anthrax, Halestorm, and Lamb of God
caption: 🎸 Legends unite for an epic finale as Black Sabbath rocks the stage with an all-star lineup! 🤘 #BlackSabbath #MusicLegends

title: Can We Talk About How Great Steven Tyler Sounded At Black Sabbath’s Farewell Concert?
caption: 🎤 Steven Tyler absolutely rocked the stage at Black Sabbath's farewell concert! 🤘 Who else is still buzzing from that epic performance? #LegendaryCollab

title: Watch Gang Of Four Play Their Farewell Show In Amsterdam
caption: Farewell rock legends, Gang of Four, went out with a bang in Amsterdam! 🎸🔥 Let's give them a round of applause! 🙌 #RockLegends #GangOfFour

title: Ed Sheeran’s ‘Shape of You’ Leads Apple Music’s 500 Most-Streamed Songs of the Decade List
caption: 🎶 Ed Sheeran's 'Shape of You' reigns supreme on Apple Music's decade-end stream list! 🙌💥 #MusicMilestone

title: Ozzy Osbourne Delivers Final Solo Performance at “Back to the Beginning” Concert
caption: 🎸 Rock legend Ozzy Osbourne goes out with a bang in his final solo show at “Back to the Beginning” concert! 🤘 #OzzyOsbourne #MusicIcon
